snippet: The stocks of energy companies suffered large losses, while the share prices for many airlines, where fuel is a major cost, surged.
abstract: Slump in oil prices weighs on stocks, giving energy companies another day of big losses.
lead_paragraph: The stocks of energy companies suffered large losses, while the share prices for many airlines, where fuel is a major cost, surged.

headline.main: Drop in Oil Price Produces Big Winners and Losers
headline.print_headline: Drop in Oil Price Produces Big Winners and Losers
